title: Mac: My LoL Launcher doesn't work
body: Im using a Mac and when i click the LoL icon on my hot bar, it will jump up as if it is opening, but does nothing. Note that I am using the new client for preseason 7. I really need help because I can't play the game...

replies.body: I'm getting the same problem. No matter how I try to open it, it just bounces once then does nothing.
League won't open from the dock bar currently, so you'll need to use the application bar.   Let me know if that helps!
Are you telling me to go to my Finder>Applications>LoL>Open? because I tried it already and it didn't open.
Does this happen if you head into your *Applications* folder and launch League directly from there rather than from your hotbar (dock)?
Not sure if this is important but when i click the LoL icon on my hot bar it makes my screen flicker for a very brief moment.
